common.app-description: staff off offers a range of features that help organizations efficiently manage employee vacations, sick leaves, and personal days.
error.not-found-description: The page you are looking for does not exist.
page.integrations.card.google-calendar.d: Add requests to your Google Calendar to keep everything in one place.
page.integrations.card.outlook.descripti: Sync your requests with Microsoft Outlook Calendar.
page.integrations.card.outlook.title: Outlook
page.integrations.card.slack.description: Receive notifications directly in your Slack workspace.

page.integrations.card.teams.description: Stay informed with Microsoft Teams notifications.

page.integrations.header.description: Enhance your workflow by integrating Day Off with the apps you depend on.
page.integrations.header.title: Integrations
page.permission.title: Permission groups
page.reports.card.accruals.description: Shows balance details of leave types with accrual rates.
page.reports.card.balances.description: Shows the total and used balance for each leave type.
page.reports.card.carry.description: Shows the carried-over balance details for the past and current year.
page.reports.card.total.description: Shows the employees total used balance.
page.reports.title: reports
page.settings.balance.description: Set rules for carrying forward unused leave to the next cycle.
page.settings.balance.title: Balance reset
page.settings.block.description: Add blocked dates or limit the number of allowed request on any selected dates.
page.settings.block.title: Blockout dates
page.settings.calendar.description: Define which requests employees can view in their dashboard calendar.
page.settings.calendar.title: Calendar options
page.settings.email.description: Customize email notifications that are sent to employees and manage the emails sender.
page.settings.email.title: Email configurations
page.settings.holidays.description: Add and manage location settings, time zone, date formats, location leave policy and official holidays.
page.settings.holidays.title: Locations and holidays
page.settings.leave.description: Add and edit leave types and specify the unit, cycle, and color code of each leave type.
page.settings.leave.policies.description: Add and manage leave policies, enable and setup the required leave types in each leave policy.
page.settings.leave.policies.title: Leave policies
page.settings.leave.title: Leave types
